description: It appears that if any of the block device mappings fail to be created or attached that the whole instance as a whole will be failed, this does not allow for graceful retry or recovery from said failure but instead forces the instance to ERROR (which then requires manually recovery).
title: build_instance does not recover from _setup_block_device_mapping failures gracefully
